about_the_game:
Introducing “Ann’s Art School Tilesets”!
This is a nice, easy-to-use collection of art school related tiles for RPG MAKER MV and MZ! Time to get the citizens of your dream world a bit art education!

Use this set to create many types of vivid, compelling art schools to color your worldbuilding further!
Complete with elements such as exhibition hall and many departments such as design and media, sculpting, music, and even fashion!


---------------------------------
◆Material
・tileset x6（tileset B-E recommended）
・character x7

◆Sample project
・map x 8 (using this tileset)
---------------------------------

◆Ann, which uses this material, is now available.
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1511270/Ann/


◆Notes.◆
※Please refer to the sample project or the product screenshots.

・This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series ONLY
・OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker
・You may modify some of the assets (but not redistribute them) for your own game use only.
・All copyrights, neighboring rights, and all other rights to this material belong to the creator or a third party authorized by the creator.
